summary: Enthusiastic Pharmacist with a variety of experience in community pharmacy including compounding and managerial experience. Enjoys multitasking by working with other healthcare professionals and insurance providers to ensure optimal patient outcomes. Thrives on working in a team environment to provide an efficient and positive patient experience.

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: Experience in ACHC accreditation and compounding product development. Pharmacy workflow solutions and marketing strategies. Insurance billing knowledge including specialty medications, expertise in State Board inspections and license reciprocity process.

experience.title: Pharmacist in Charge
experience.description: Set up a newly purchased pharmacy that specialized in non-sterile compounding. Created a logical and efficient system to process prescriptions, compounding, product verification, and shipping arrangements. Developed many compounded medications such as topical analgesics, scar diminishing creams, and a variety of metabolic supplements. Enjoyed managing a team to promote a positive and efficient work environment.

experience.title: Staff Pharmacist
experience.description: Gained initial non-sterile compounding experience. Involved with processing, verifying prescriptions, and product verification. Learned record keeping for compounding ingredients, batch and patient specific compounding. Worked to create optimal workflow, product marketing, and develop business.

experience.title: Staff Pharmacist
experience.description: Pharmacist with diverse experience within the company. Staffed at a high-volume 24 hour store and a clinic store. As staff pharmacist helped to manage operations, participated in drug utilization review and medication therapy management for multiple stores. Promoted immunizations and enjoyed patient interaction and counseling.
